alert.note: Alert for Boone (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 21 at 7:35PM EDT until September 21 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR OHIO...SOUTHERN DEARBORN AND NORTHERN BOONE COUNTIES... At 734 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dillsboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Greendale, Aurora, Rising Sun, Dillsboro, Moores Hill, Wilmington, French, Hartford, Mount Sinai, Aberdeen, Pate, Cold Springs, Farmers Retreat, Bear Branch, Petersburg and Rabbit Hash. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
